title: Two names released in accidental shooting
content:
Two names have been released by the Burke County Sheriff’s Office in the case of a 17-year-old girl being accidentally shot on New Year’s Eve in Morganton.
Witnesses stated that Devan Nathaniel Mojica, 21, and Nathan Allen Brewer, 22, began firing a handgun in the direction of a bonfire and the victim was struck, said release from the Burke County Sheriff's Office.
Thank you for reading!
